editorialSummary.text: Chain dedicated to custom storage solutions for the home, with an emphasis on closets & shelving.

originalText.text: The installation professionals ðŸ™ŽNick and Alex were professional and detail-oriented. After completing the project, the site was cleaned and the closets were cleaned well. The designer Brain has good control over the details of the design and maximized the use of space to meet our storage needs in a small space. Thank you California Closets and your entire team. I made the right choice for our new apartment. The closets are beautiful and elegant, and the inner and outer closets are high quality. All corners are rounded and smooth, and the dimensions are ergonomic. Thank you California Closets again.  I hope you will have better and better business

originalText.text: I had a custom multiple drawers order which had to be designed to fit my space on site as a replacement for a 49 year-old unit. The California Closets designer I worked with, Kate Majoy, was excellent. It took a while to get all the details right and installation was scheduled for three months later. When we finally got to that point, it went smoothly and was accomplished in one day with the techs leaving my room clean after they finished. All around a good experience and the new drawers work beautifully. I highly recommend the company.

originalText.text: Our design consultant was Kaylee Barrett and she helped us design the perfect shelves for our living room. She was efficient and understood what we wanted and very helpful in bringing to life our vision. The builders were professional and efficient - they installed the shelves in a couple of hours as promised. We are very satisfied with the service and would definitely recommend California Closets to our friends.

originalText.text: Brian and the team from California Closets did an incredible job with my built-in closets. The design and buildout was perfect. The materials are high quality and beautiful. Theyâ€™re also way more reasonably priced and professional than any other closet contractor I reached out to. I wish all contractors were like this. I canâ€™t wait to have them come back to create some more closets for me!

originalText.text: From our first consultation with our design consultant, Lea Nardi, to designing our closet and finally the installation, California Closet exceeded all our expectations! Communication was seamless throughout the design process and Lea was super knowledgeable and helped us come up with creative ways to add more storage in our space. Our installers, Ryan and Hunter, were professional, friendly and extremely precise with their work, taking time to ensure all pieces fit seamlessly. We couldn't speak more highly about our entire experience and will definitely recommend California Closets to any one in the market for creative storage solutions!
